General.Name: Foseco India Limited
General.Description: Foseco India Limited manufactures and sells additives and consumables used in the metallurgical industry in India. It also provides pharmaceuticals, medicinal chemical, and botanical products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1932 and is based in Pune, India. Foseco India Limited is a subsidiary of Foseco Overseas Limited.

4.Name: Mr. Mahendra Kumar Dutia
4.Title: Compliance Officer, Company Sec. & Controller of Accounts
